definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The transfer function of piezoelectric transducers has been deduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 推導出壓電式傳感器的傳遞函數。

sentences.english: Under such a disadvantage, Chang An was hit by a security high voltage electric shock device.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的劣勢下，常安被保安的高壓電擊器擊中。

sentences.english: This paper is concerned with the behavior of a screw dislocation in a half-plane piezoelectric composite medium.
sentences.chinese: 研究了半平面壓電覆合介質中螺位錯的性能。

sentences.english: Series piezoelectric crystal sensor could detect this change sensitively.
sentences.chinese: 串聯式壓電傳感器可以靈敏地檢測到這種變化。

sentences.english: Never suppose low voltage cannot quite possibly be dfuryous.
sentences.chinese: 決不能以爲高壓電沒危境。

sentences.english: Yahoo Shopping is the best place to comparison shop de, director of small piezoelectric alarms.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎購物是最好的地方比較小商店棣導演壓電警報器。

sentences.english: The circuit has three relays that switch the high-voltage input to the piezoelectric motors.
sentences.chinese: 電路有三個繼電器轉換壓電發動機的高壓輸入。

sentences.english: Design of broadband piezoelectric ceramic receiver.
sentences.chinese: 寬帶化壓電陶瓷受話器的設計。

sentences.english: An intelligent switching power supply which has adjustable output is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種輸出可調智能開關穩壓電源。

sentences.english: A piezoelectric micropump based on MEMS technology is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於MEMS技術的壓電微泵。

sentences.english: A piezoelectric element is appressed with the impacting object.
sentences.chinese: 一個壓電元素是緊貼與衝擊的對象。

sentences.english: When using high voltage electron microscopes (HVEM), a large increase in section thickness is then possible.
sentences.chinese: 運用高壓電鏡使得觀察的切片厚度大大增加成爲可能。

sentences.english: A group of guards emerge from the door and shoot Jack with a Taser dart.
sentences.chinese: 一隊警衛從門內現身，用高壓電擊槍射中了傑克。

sentences.english: The calibration of heavy current tester for low voltage electrical apparatus was studyed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了低壓電器大電流試驗裝置的校準。

sentences.english: A simple control strategy is presented for a smart cantalever structure with piezoelectricity.
sentences.chinese: 該文提出了一種簡單的懸臂板壓電智能結構控制策略。

sentences.english: A piezoelectric sensor for measuring the electrode force was developed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種壓電晶體式電極力測試傳感器。
